system:
note description: "EiffelVision text component. Implementation interface." legal: "See notice at end of class." status: "See notice at end of class." date: "$Date: 2014-04-17 15:19:54 -0700 (Thu, 17 Apr 2014) $" revision: "$Revision: 94888 $"
deferred class ../implementation_interface/ev_text_component_i.xmlEV_TEXT_COMPONENT_I
inherit ../implementation_interface/ev_primitive_i.xmlEV_PRIMITIVE_I redefine ../implementation_interface/ev_text_component_i.xml#f_interfaceinterface end
../implementation_interface/ev_textable_i.xmlEV_TEXTABLE_I redefine ../implementation_interface/ev_text_component_i.xml#f_interfaceinterface end
../implementation_interface/ev_text_component_action_sequences_i.xmlEV_TEXT_COMPONENT_ACTION_SEQUENCES_I
feature -- Access
f_text_length../implementation_interface/ev_text_component_i.xml#f_text_lengthtext_length: FalseINTEGER_32 -- Length of the text in Current. do Result := ../implementation_interface/ev_textable_i.xml#f_texttext.Falsecount ensure result_not_negative: Result >= 0 end
f_selected_text../implementation_interface/ev_text_component_i.xml#f_selected_textselected_text: FalseSTRING_32 -- Text currently selected in Current. do Result := ../implementation_interface/ev_textable_i.xml#f_texttext.Falsesubstring (../implementation_interface/ev_text_component_i.xml#f_start_selectionstart_selection, ../implementation_interface/ev_text_component_i.xml#f_end_selectionend_selection - 1) end
f_maximum_character_width../implementation_interface/ev_text_component_i.xml#f_maximum_character_widthmaximum_character_width: FalseINTEGER_32 -- Maximum width of a single character in Current. deferred end
f_clipboard_content../implementation_interface/ev_text_component_i.xml#f_clipboard_contentclipboard_content: FalseSTRING_32 -- Result is current clipboard content. deferred end
feature -- Status report
f_is_editable../implementation_interface/ev_text_component_i.xml#f_is_editableis_editable: FalseBOOLEAN -- Is the text editable by the user? deferred end
f_caret_position../implementation_interface/ev_text_component_i.xml#f_caret_positioncaret_position: FalseINTEGER_32 -- Current position of the caret. deferred end
f_has_selection../implementation_interface/ev_text_component_i.xml#f_has_selectionhas_selection: FalseBOOLEAN -- Does Current have a selection? deferred end
f_start_selection../implementation_interface/ev_text_component_i.xml#f_start_selectionstart_selection: FalseINTEGER_32 -- Caret position of the start of selected text if any, -- otherwise ../implementation_interface/ev_text_component_i.xml#f_caret_positioncaret_position. deferred ensure result_large_enough: Result >= 1 result_small_enough: Result <= ../implementation_interface/ev_text_component_i.xml#f_text_lengthtext_length + 1 consistent_with_selection_start: Result >= ../implementation_interface/ev_text_component_i.xml#f_start_selectionstart_selection end
f_end_selection../implementation_interface/ev_text_component_i.xml#f_end_selectionend_selection: FalseINTEGER_32 -- Caret position of the end of selected text if any, -- otherwise ../implementation_interface/ev_text_component_i.xml#f_caret_positioncaret_position. deferred ensure result_large_enough: Result >= 1 result_small_enough: Result <= ../implementation_interface/ev_text_component_i.xml#f_text_lengthtext_length + 1 consistent_with_selection_end: ../implementation_interface/ev_text_component_i.xml#f_end_selectionend_selection >= Result end
f_valid_caret_position../implementation_interface/ev_text_component_i.xml#f_valid_caret_positionvalid_caret_position (pos: FalseINTEGER_32): FalseBOOLEAN -- Is pos a valid position for the caret? do Result := pos >= 1 and pos <= ../implementation_interface/ev_text_component_i.xml#f_text_lengthtext_length + 1 end
feature -- Status setting
f_set_editable../implementation_interface/ev_text_component_i.xml#f_set_editableset_editable (flag: FalseBOOLEAN) -- if flag then make the component read-write. -- if not flag then make the component read-only. deferred end
f_set_caret_position../implementation_interface/ev_text_component_i.xml#f_set_caret_positionset_caret_position (pos: FalseINTEGER_32) -- set current insertion position require valid_caret_position: pos >= 1 and pos <= ../implementation_interface/ev_text_component_i.xml#f_text_lengthtext_length + 1 deferred end
feature -- Element change
f_insert_text../implementation_interface/ev_text_component_i.xml#f_insert_textinsert_text (a_text: FalseREADABLE_STRING_GENERAL) -- Insert a_text at the current caret position. require valid_text: a_text /= Void deferred end
f_append_text../implementation_interface/ev_text_component_i.xml#f_append_textappend_text (a_text: FalseREADABLE_STRING_GENERAL) -- append 'a_text' into Current. require valid_text: a_text /= Void deferred end
f_prepend_text../implementation_interface/ev_text_component_i.xml#f_prepend_textprepend_text (a_text: FalseREADABLE_STRING_GENERAL) -- prepend 'a_text' into Current. require valid_text: a_text /= Void deferred end
feature -- Resizing
f_set_minimum_width_in_characters../implementation_interface/ev_text_component_i.xml#f_set_minimum_width_in_charactersset_minimum_width_in_characters (nb: FalseINTEGER_32) -- Make a minimum of nb of the widest character visible -- on one line. require valid_nb: nb > 0 deferred end
feature {../interface/ev_any.xmlEV_ANY, ../implementation_interface/ev_any_i.xmlEV_ANY_I} -- Basic operation
f_select_region../implementation_interface/ev_text_component_i.xml#f_select_regionselect_region (start_pos, end_pos: FalseINTEGER_32) -- Select (highlight) the characters between character positions start_pos and end_pos. require valid_start_character_position: start_pos >= 1 and start_pos <= ../implementation_interface/ev_text_component_i.xml#f_text_lengthtext_length valid_end_character_position: end_pos >= 1 and end_pos <= ../implementation_interface/ev_text_component_i.xml#f_text_lengthtext_length deferred ensure has_selection: ../implementation_interface/ev_text_component_i.xml#f_has_selectionhas_selection selection_set: (start_pos <= end_pos implies ../implementation_interface/ev_text_component_i.xml#f_start_selectionstart_selection = start_pos and ../implementation_interface/ev_text_component_i.xml#f_end_selectionend_selection = end_pos + 1) or ../implementation_interface/ev_text_component_i.xml#f_start_selectionstart_selection = end_pos and ../implementation_interface/ev_text_component_i.xml#f_end_selectionend_selection = start_pos + 1 end
f_set_selection../implementation_interface/ev_text_component_i.xml#f_set_selectionset_selection (a_start_pos, a_end_pos: FalseINTEGER_32) -- Select (highlight) the characters between valid caret positions a_start_pos and a_end_pos. require valid_start: a_start_pos > 0 and a_start_pos <= ../implementation_interface/ev_text_component_i.xml#f_text_lengthtext_length + 1 valid_end: a_end_pos > 0 and a_end_pos <= ../implementation_interface/ev_text_component_i.xml#f_text_lengthtext_length + 1 deferred ensure selection_set: a_start_pos /= a_end_pos = ../implementation_interface/ev_text_component_i.xml#f_has_selectionhas_selection end
f_select_all../implementation_interface/ev_text_component_i.xml#f_select_allselect_all -- Select all the text of Current. require positive_length: ../implementation_interface/ev_text_component_i.xml#f_text_lengthtext_length > 0 do ../implementation_interface/ev_text_component_i.xml#f_select_regionselect_region (1, ../implementation_interface/ev_textable_i.xml#f_texttext.Falsecount) ensure has_selection: ../implementation_interface/ev_text_component_i.xml#f_has_selectionhas_selection selection_start_set: ../implementation_interface/ev_text_component_i.xml#f_start_selectionstart_selection = 1 selection_end_set: ../implementation_interface/ev_text_component_i.xml#f_end_selectionend_selection = ../implementation_interface/ev_text_component_i.xml#f_text_lengthtext_length + 1 end
f_deselect_all../implementation_interface/ev_text_component_i.xml#f_deselect_alldeselect_all -- Unselect the current selection. deferred ensure has_no_selection: not ../implementation_interface/ev_text_component_i.xml#f_has_selectionhas_selection end
f_delete_selection../implementation_interface/ev_text_component_i.xml#f_delete_selectiondelete_selection -- Delete the current selection. require has_selection: ../implementation_interface/ev_text_component_i.xml#f_has_selectionhas_selection is_editable: ../implementation_interface/ev_text_component_i.xml#f_is_editableis_editable deferred ensure has_no_selection: not ../implementation_interface/ev_text_component_i.xml#f_has_selectionhas_selection end
f_cut_selection../implementation_interface/ev_text_component_i.xml#f_cut_selectioncut_selection -- Cut selected_region by erasing it from -- the text and putting it in the Clipboard to paste it later. -- If selectd_region is empty, it does nothing. require has_selection: ../implementation_interface/ev_text_component_i.xml#f_has_selectionhas_selection is_editable: ../implementation_interface/ev_text_component_i.xml#f_is_editableis_editable deferred end
f_copy_selection../implementation_interface/ev_text_component_i.xml#f_copy_selectioncopy_selection -- Copy selected_region into the Clipboard. -- If the selected_region is empty, it does nothing. require has_selection: ../implementation_interface/ev_text_component_i.xml#f_has_selectionhas_selection deferred end
f_paste../implementation_interface/ev_text_component_i.xml#f_pastepaste (index: FalseINTEGER_32) -- Insert the contents of the clipboard -- at index postion of ../implementation_interface/ev_textable_i.xml#f_texttext. -- If the Clipboard is empty, it does nothing. require index_large_enough: index >= 1 index_small_enough: index <= ../implementation_interface/ev_text_component_i.xml#f_text_lengthtext_length + 1 is_editable: ../implementation_interface/ev_text_component_i.xml#f_is_editableis_editable deferred end
feature {../interface/ev_any.xmlEV_ANY, ../implementation_interface/ev_any_i.xmlEV_ANY_I} -- Implementation
f_interface../implementation_interface/ev_text_component_i.xml#f_interfaceinterface: detachable ../interface/ev_text_component.xmlEV_TEXT_COMPONENT note option: stable attribute end
note copyright: "Copyright (c) 1984-2014, Eiffel Software and others" license: "Eiffel Forum License v2 (see http://www.eiffel.com/licensing/forum.txthttp://www.eiffel.com/licensing/forum.txt)" source: "[ Eiffel Software 5949 Hollister Ave., Goleta, CA 93117 USA Telephone 805-685-1006, Fax 805-685-6869 Website http://www.eiffel.comhttp://www.eiffel.com Customer support http://support.eiffel.comhttp://support.eiffel.com ]"
end -- class ../implementation_interface/ev_text_component_i.xmlEV_TEXT_COMPONENT_I
